title: Massugu ni Ikou.
synopsis: A talking dog is a beautiful story that you should have dreamt of as a child. But if you have forgotten about it, this is a reminder of that fable story. This is the story of a dog that talks, but ordinary people cannot hear his voice.
voices: ['Yoshino, Hiroyuki', 'Orikasa, Fumiko', 'Nojima, Kenji', 'Hanba, Tomoe', 'Suzumura, Kenichi', 'Kojima, Sachiko', 'Shitaya, Noriko', 'Morikawa, Toshiyuki', 'Suzuki, Masami']
staff: [['Iwanami, Yoshikazu', ['Sound Director']], ['Itami, Aki', ['Script']], ['Oshima, Michiru', ['Music']], ['Katou, Youichi', ['Series Composition']]]
